directions: Heat a 6 quart stock pot over medium-high heat. Brown sausage. Add seasoning mix and stock and bring to a boil. Add spinach and return to a boil. Add cream. Serve.
4 servings. Per serving: 339 Calories, 27g Fat, 8g Carbs, 18g Protein, 4g Fiber, 4g Net Carbs
ingredients: 16 oz Premium pork sausage by jimmy dean
48 fl oz Organic chicken stock by kirkland signature
4 fl oz Cream fluid heavy whipping
*16 oz Spinach frozen chopped or leaf unprepared
title: sausage soup that takes about 15 minutes to cook
